name: The FUTCCGCSC: the adventures of a very sad cyclops
name_original: The FUTCCGCSC: the adventures of a very sad cyclops
description:
The FUTCCGCSC (pronounced Foot Kageksh) is the:

  • Forever-Unhappy
  • Time-Controlling
  • Coin-Gathering
  • Squared Cyclops

The FUTCCGCSC has always been bullied because of its "unique" shape: no other cyclops would be friends with a squared cyclops. As soon as he was found outside by any other cyclops, they'd shoot at him with their cyclops beam.

But FUTCCGCSC's favourite activity was playing the game "gather the coins", his favourite-est game ever. That's a game for more cyclops, but he had learnt to play alone. The biggest problem was that gather the coins has to be played outside, where he was constantly being bullied by other cyclops. But he'd put up with the beams and try to dodge them for the sake of his favourite game.

One day, however, he noticed that the other cyclops' beams became slower and slower. FUTCCGCSC had learned to slow time down. That was a huge thing for him. Yeah, he could only slow time by standing still, but even then that let him play his game and become better and better at dodging the beams. Maybe he will cheer up someday? Maybe after picking up 50 coins in one game?
